*exponential part

// reg1 = 1 +1i
LRI $1, 1d
1100-1000-0010-0000-0000-0001-0000-0000
LII $1, 1d
1100-0100-0010-0000-0000-0001-0000-0000


//reg2 = 0.5 + 0.5i
LRI $2, 0.5d
1100-1000-0100-0000-0000-0000-1000-0000
LII $2,0.5d
1100-0100-0100-0000-0000-0000-1000-0000


add $3,$1,$2
1000-0100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


sub $3,$1,$2
1000-1000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


mul $3,$1,$2
1000-1100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


div $3,$1,$2
1001-0000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


dual $3,$1
1001-0100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


inv $3,$1
1001-1000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


conv $3,$1
1001-1100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


cmp $3,$1,$2
1010-0000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


*polar part
//reg1: r=2 , theta = 0.3926
LRI $1,2
1100-1000-0010-0000-0000-0010-0000-0000
LII $1,0.3926
1100-0100-0010-0000-0000-0000-0110-0100

//reg2: r=1 , theta = 0.3926
LRI $2,1
1100-1000-0100-0000-0000-0001-0000-0000
LII $2,0.3926
1100-0100-0100-0000-0000-0000-0110-0100


add $3,$1,$2
1010-0100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


sub $3,$1,$2
1010-1000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


mul $3,$1,$2
1010-1100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


div $3,$1,$2
1011-0000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000


dual $3,$2
1011-0100-0110-0010-0000-1000-0000-0000


inv $3,$2
1011-1000-0110-0010-0000-1000-0000-0000


conv $s3,$2
1011-1100-0110-0010-0000-1000-0000-0000


cmp $3,$1,$2
1100-0000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000
